abstract: Winfried F.W. Bischoff, Citigroup‘s outgoing chairman, will formally head out the door on Feb. 23. But he is not waiting until next month to say goodbye to his associates at Citi.
snippet: Winfried F.W. Bischoff, Citigroup‘s outgoing chairman, will formally head out the door on Feb. 23. But he is not waiting until next month to say goodbye to his associates at Citi.
lead_paragraph: Winfried F.W. Bischoff, Citigroup‘s outgoing chairman, will formally head out the door on Feb. 23. But he is not waiting until next month to say goodbye to his associates at Citi.

headline.main: Bischoff Bids a Fond Farewell to Citigroup
